Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.krysalis.barcode4j.impl.DrawingUtil.drawCenteredText(Canvas, AbstractBarcodeBean, String, double, double, double)
    Use DrawingUtil.drawText(Canvas, AbstractBarcodeBean, String, double, double, double, TextAlignment) instead.
    org.krysalis.barcode4j.output.Canvas.drawCenteredText(String, double, double, double, String, double)
    Use Canvas.drawText(String, double, double, double, String, double, TextAlignment) instead.
    org.krysalis.barcode4j.impl.DrawingUtil.drawJustifiedText(Canvas, AbstractBarcodeBean, String, double, double, double)
    Use DrawingUtil.drawText(Canvas, AbstractBarcodeBean, String, double, double, double, TextAlignment) instead.
    org.krysalis.barcode4j.output.Canvas.drawJustifiedText(String, double, double, double, String, double)
    Use Canvas.drawText(String, double, double, double, String, double, TextAlignment) instead.
